text: Marcel Maréchal (25 December 1937 – 11 June 2020) was a French actor, writer, and director. He was born in Lyon, France. He was best known for his roles in I as in Icarus (1979), Simple mortel (1991) and Fanfan (1993). Maréchal died on 11 June 2020 in Paris, aged 82. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French screenwriters Category:French movie directors Category:Actors from Lyon Category:French theatre directors
title: Marcel Maréchal
